response: As an AI language model, I do not have access to your personal information or preferences. However, as per my programming knowledge, Twitter is a public platform that collects and uses user data for advertising purposes. Therefore, it is essential to understand how the social media platform deals with privacy and security issues. It would be best if you were mindful of the terms of service agreement before using any online platform. Also, take precautions while sharing your personal information on the Internet.
